alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 5:39PM CDT until June 11 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Northeastern Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 538 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Little Bayou Meto Park, or 19 miles north of Dumas, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dumas... Gould... Gillett... Mitchellville... Watson... Yancopin... Langford... Douglas... Little Bayou Meto Park... Merrisach Lake... Trusten Holder WMA... Arkansas Post... Pendleton... Tichnor... Reedville... Morgan Point Recreation Area... Reydell... Sarassa... Pickens in Desha County... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
